channel.title: How to put custom weapons into server?
channel.description:
Hey I downloaded a file off of the model thread which is the Two Axes by Lorre, RoseJuice, Dyon and Emperor.
I dont know exactly how to put them into the server, would anyone mind giving me a brief tutorial please? ________________
Thanks in advanced :)

item.title: How to put custom weapons into server?
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

hmm, is the model id in the int correct? and with the d claws on the floor what might be the problem is the model id in the ints for what it looks like on the ground is the same as d claws.

Read full topic
item.source: How to put custom weapons into server?

item.title: How to put custom weapons into server?
item.dc:creator: @ipkudown ipkudown
item.description:
@ipkudown wrote:

all you need is go to your models and paste this model

and back to class8

and add tha int

compile

run client again

type

addmodel @@@@
not
::addmodel
or
//addmodel

this will make the game lagg when the lagg go type

::pickup @@@@ %

or in another servers its

::item @@@@ %

Read full topic

item.description:

So i tried another one called dual ags, but it shows up as d claws on the floor :O!

item.title: How to put custom weapons into server?
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

all u have to do is copy and paste the models into the model folder in client and copy and paste the ints into the class8.java under the rest of em.
